name: Stickman Tuber Tycoon
description:
Start your very own Stickman tube channel. Record and edit videos on a range of subjects and watch as the views and subscribers grow... then sit back and count the money as your tuber channel goes viral!

In Stickman Tuber Tycoon you can experience the highs and lows of running your very own video vlogger channel. Record a range of different video subjects - including vlogs, video games, movies, fashion, dogs and pranks. Experience the thrills of starting a professional youtube channel first hand!

Earn money to upgrade your equipment and skills, furnish your studio or buy new properties!
Start your vlogging life in a garden shed and earn enough money to climb the social ladder, upgrade to a bedsit, city apartment, country house or even a castle!

+ A classic idle clicker / tapper game popularised by the cookie clicker games.
+ Click, click, click (or tap, tap, tap!) your way to vlogging success!
+ Incremental gameplay. Gradually upgrade your skills and build your tuber empire.
+ Record tuber videos on a variety of subjects and watch them go viral!
+ Upgrade your studio, equipment and skills with all the money you have earned!
+ Buy items to show off your wealth - including a dog, jukebox, arcade machine, cinema, snooker table and swimming pool!
